name: Pixel Noir - Tales from the Beta
detailed_description:
"Tales from the Beta" features 12 tracks from the Pixel Noir Beta, featuring music by composers Kunal Majmudar & Hiroki Kikuta! It includes both the overworld and battle versions of Little Shanghai, the Industrial District, the Armory, and more! Grab it and get a taste of what Pinnacle City sounds like!

Here's the full tracklist:
  • Ramen as a Concept
  • Ramen as a Truth
  • Junkyard Blues
  • Casino Royale
  • Dreaming in Solitude
  • Dream Becomes Nightmare
  • Interlude (Midboss)
  • A Blue-Collar Kind of Town
  • Industry Worth Fighting For
  • Breaking into the Armory
  • Arm Yourself in the Armory!
  • Fighting for Truth (Boss)

Notes:
-Interlude (Midboss) - composer Hiroki Kikuta, arr. Kunal Majmudar
-Fighting for Truth (Boss) - composer Hiroki Kikuta, arr. Kunal Majmudar

Minimum:

  • Processor: SSE2 instruction
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10
  • Storage: 184 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Soundtrack
